directions: Halve eggs lengthwise and carefully remove yolks. Purée yolks, goat cheese, milk, mustard, pepper, and salt in a food processor until smooth. Add dill and pulse until finely chopped.
Spoon (or pipe using a pastry bag) goat cheese mixture into egg whites.
ingredients: 2 1/2 oz fresh mild goat cheese (1/3 cup) at room temperature
title: Stuffed Eggs with Goat Cheese and Dill
